replies.body: Anytime you have problems with account info, you need to talk with those agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I'd love to help out here, but due to account security reasons, we need to have this done ticket side. After you verify yourself as the original creator by answering the questions, they'll be able to set everything right again.
